name: cryptobiolin
desc: Causes confusion and dizziness.
effects: * Causes stuttering for at least 0.2s without accumulation
effectLine:
'''Medicine''':
* Causes stuttering for at least 0.2s without accumulation
* Causes drunkness

name: dylovene
desc: A broad-spectrum anti-toxin, which treats toxin damage in organisms. Overdosing will cause vomiting, dizzyness and pain.
effects: * Deals 2 Brute when there's at least 20u of dylovene
* Causes jittering when there's at least 20u of dylovene
* Has a 2% chance to cause vomiting when there's at least 20u of dylovene
* Causes drunkness when there's at least 15u of dylovene
effectLine: '''Medicine''': * Heals 1 Poison * Deals 2 Brute when there's at least 20u of dylovene * Causes jittering when there's at least 20u of dylovene * Has a 2% chance to cause vomiting when there's at least 20u of dylovene * Causes drunkness when there's at least 15u of dylovene '''Plants''': * Adjusts toxins level by -10 * Adjusts health by 1

name: diphenhydramine
desc: Rapidly purges the body of histamine, reduces jitteriness, and treats poison damage.
effects: * Removes 3u of histamine from the solution
effectLine: '''Medicine''': * Removes 3u of histamine from the solution * Removes 3s of jittering * Heals 3 Poison

name: ethylredoxrazine
desc: Neutralises the effects of alcohol in the blood stream. Though it is commonly needed, it is rarely requested.
effectLine: '''Medicine''': * Removes 6s of drunkness * Heals 0.5 Poison

name: arithrazine
desc: A mildly unstable medication used for the most extreme case of radiation poisoning. Exerts minor stress on the body.
effects: * Modifies health by 0.5 Brute and 3 Radiation
effectLine: '''Medicine''': * Modifies health by 0.5 Brute and 3 Radiation

name: bicaridine
desc: An analgesic which is highly effective at treating brute damage. It's useful for stabilizing people who have been severely beaten, as well as treating less life-threatening injuries.
effects: * Deals 0.5 Asphyxiation and 1.5 Poison when there's at least 15u of bicaridine
* Has a 2% chance to cause vomiting when there's at least 30u of bicaridine
* Causes jittering when there's at least 15u of bicaridine
effectLine: '''Medicine''': * Heals 2 Brute * Deals 0.5 Asphyxiation and 1.5 Poison when there's at least 15u of bicaridine * Has a 2% chance to cause vomiting when there's at least 30u of bicaridine * Causes jittering when there's at least 15u of bicaridine * Causes drunkness

name: cryoxadone
desc: Required for the proper function of cryogenics. Heals all standard types of damage, but only works in temperatures under 213K. It can treat and rejuvenate plants when applied in small doses.
effects: * Heals 6 Airloss, 4 Brute, 6 Burn, and 4 Toxin when the body's temperature is at most 213k
* Ages back the plant, depending on the plant's age and time to grow
effectLine: '''Medicine''': * Heals 6 Airloss, 4 Brute, 6 Burn, and 4 Toxin when the body's temperature is at most 213k '''Plants''': * Adjusts toxins level by -5 * Adjusts health by 5 * Ages back the plant, depending on the plant's age and time to grow

name: doxarubixadone
desc: A cryogenics chemical. Heals certain types of cellular damage done by Slimes and improper use of other chemicals.
effects: * Heals 2 Cellular when the body's temperature is at most 213k
effectLine: '''Medicine''': * Heals 2 Cellular when the body's temperature is at most 213k

name: dermaline
desc: An advanced chemical that is more effective at treating burn damage than kelotane.
effects: * Heals 1.5 Heat, 1.5 Shock, and 1.5 Cold
* Deals 0.5 Brute, 1 Asphyxiation, and 2 Cold when there's at least 10u of dermaline
* Causes jittering when there's at least 10u of dermaline
effectLine: '''Medicine''': * Heals 1.5 Heat, 1.5 Shock, and 1.5 Cold * Deals 0.5 Brute, 1 Asphyxiation, and 2 Cold when there's at least 10u of dermaline * Causes jittering when there's at least 10u of dermaline

name: dexalin
desc: Used for treating minor oxygen deprivation and bloodloss. A required reagent for dexalin plus.
effects: * Heals 1 Asphyxiation and 0.5 Bloodloss
* Deals 3 Asphyxiation and 1 Cold when there's at least 20u of dexalin
effectLine: '''Medicine''': * Heals 1 Asphyxiation and 0.5 Bloodloss * Deals 3 Asphyxiation and 1 Cold when there's at least 20u of dexalin

name: dexalin plus
desc: Used in treatment of extreme cases of oxygen deprivation and bloodloss. Flushes heartbreaker toxin out of the blood stream.
effects: * Heals 3.5 Asphyxiation and 3 Bloodloss
* Removes 3u of heartbreaker toxin from the solution when there's at least 1u of heartbreaker toxin
* Deals 5 Asphyxiation and 3 Cold when there's at least 25u of dexalin plus
effectLine: '''Medicine''': * Heals 3.5 Asphyxiation and 3 Bloodloss * Removes 3u of heartbreaker toxin from the solution when there's at least 1u of heartbreaker toxin * Deals 5 Asphyxiation and 3 Cold when there's at least 25u of dexalin plus

name: epinephrine
desc: An effective stabilizing chemical used to keep a critical person from dying to asphyxiation while patching up minor damage during crit. Flushes heartbreaker toxin out the blood stream at the cost of more epinephrine, but may add histamine. Helps reduce stun time. Commonly found in the form of emergency medipens.
effects: * Heals 0.5 Brute, 0.5 Burn, 3 Asphyxiation, and 0.5 Poison when the mob is critical and there's at most 20u of epinephrine
* Deals 1 Asphyxiation and 1 Poison when there's at least 20u of epinephrine
* Removes 2u of heartbreaker toxin from the solution
* Removes 1u of epinephrine from the solution when there's at least 1u of heartbreaker toxin
* Has a 10% chance to add 4u of histamine to the solution when there's at least 1u of heartbreaker toxin
effectLine: '''Medicine''': * Heals 0.5 Brute, 0.5 Burn, 3 Asphyxiation, and 0.5 Poison when the mob is critical and there's at most 20u of epinephrine * Deals 1 Asphyxiation and 1 Poison when there's at least 20u of epinephrine * Removes 2u of heartbreaker toxin from the solution * Removes 1u of epinephrine from the solution when there's at least 1u of heartbreaker toxin * Has a 10% chance to add 4u of histamine to the solution when there's at least 1u of heartbreaker toxin * Removes 0.75s of stunning * Removes 0.75s of knockdown

name: hyronalin
desc: A weak treatment for radiation damage. A precursor to arithrazine and phalanximine. Can cause vomiting.
effects: * Has a 2% chance to cause vomiting
* Deals 2 Heat when there's at least 30u of hyronalin
* Causes jittering when there's at least 30u of hyronalin
effectLine: '''Medicine''': * Heals 1 Radiation * Has a 2% chance to cause vomiting * Deals 2 Heat when there's at least 30u of hyronalin * Causes jittering when there's at least 30u of hyronalin

name: ipecac
desc: A rapid-acting emetic. Useful for stopping unmetabolized poisons, or mass-vomiting sessions.
effects: * Has a 30% chance to cause vomiting when there's at least 4u of ipecac
effectLine:
'''Medicine''':
* Has a 30% chance to cause vomiting when there's at least 4u of ipecac

name: inaprovaline
desc: Inaprovaline is a synaptic stimulant and cardiostimulant, commonly used to treat asphyxiation damage caused during critical states and reduce bleeding. Used in many advanced medicines.
effects: * Heals 5 Asphyxiation when the mob is critical
effectLine: '''Medicine''': * Heals 5 Asphyxiation when the mob is critical * Reduces bleeding

name: kelotane
desc: Treats burn damage. Overdosing greatly reduces the body's ability to retain water.
effects: * Heals 0.33 Heat, 0.33 Shock, and 0.33 Cold
* Satiates thirst at -3.333x the average rate when there's at least 30u of kelotane
effectLine: '''Medicine''': * Heals 0.33 Heat, 0.33 Shock, and 0.33 Cold * Satiates thirst at -3.333x the average rate when there's at least 30u of kelotane

name: leporazine
desc: A chemical used to stabilize body temperature and rapidly cure cold damage. Great for unprotected EVA travel, but prevents the use of cryogenic tubes.
effects: * Adds 100kJ of heat to the body it's in when the body's temperature is at most 293.15k
* Removes 10kJ of heat from the body it's in when the body's temperature is at least 293.15k
* Removes 5u of Fresium from the solution
effectLine: '''Medicine''': * Heals 4 Cold * Adds 100kJ of heat to the body it's in when the body's temperature is at most 293.15k * Removes 10kJ of heat from the body it's in when the body's temperature is at least 293.15k * Removes 5u of Fresium from the solution

name: barozine
desc: A potent chemical that prevents pressure damage. Causes extreme stress on the body.
effects: * Has a 30% chance to deal 0.5 Heat
* Deals 3 Poison when there's at least 30u of barozine
* Has a 15% chance to cause vomiting when there's at least 30u of barozine
* Causes pressure immunity for at least 0.2s without accumulation
* Causes stuttering for at least 0.2s without accumulation
effectLine: '''Medicine''': * Has a 30% chance to deal 0.5 Heat * Deals 3 Poison when there's at least 30u of barozine * Has a 15% chance to cause vomiting when there's at least 30u of barozine * Causes pressure immunity for at least 0.2s without accumulation * Causes stuttering for at least 0.2s without accumulation * Causes jittering

name: phalanximine
desc: An advanced chemical used in the treatment of cancer. Causes moderate radiation poisoning on organics and vomiting. Can potentially remove the death gene on plants.
effects: * Modifies health by 1 Cellular and 1 Radiation
* Has a 5% chance to cause vomiting
* Restores viability to a plant rendered nonviable by a mutation when there's at least 4u of phalanximine
effectLine: '''Medicine''': * Modifies health by 1 Cellular and 1 Radiation * Has a 5% chance to cause vomiting '''Plants''': * Adjusts toxins level by 6 * Restores viability to a plant rendered nonviable by a mutation when there's at least 4u of phalanximine

name: Polypyrylium Oligomers
desc: A purple mixture of short polyelectrolyte chains not easily synthesized in the laboratory. Heals asphyxiation and brute damage. Stops bleeding over time.
effects: * Heals 3.5 Brute and 2.5 Asphyxiation
* Deals 3.5 Asphyxiation when there's at least 30u of Polypyrylium Oligomers
effectLine: '''Medicine''': * Heals 3.5 Brute and 2.5 Asphyxiation * Deals 3.5 Asphyxiation when there's at least 30u of Polypyrylium Oligomers * Reduces bleeding

name: ambuzol
desc: A highly engineered substance able to halt the progression of a zombie infection.
effects: * Cures an ongoing zombie infection when there's at least 10u of ambuzol
effectLine:
'''Medicine''':
* Cures an ongoing zombie infection when there's at least 10u of ambuzol

name: ambuzol plus
desc: Further engineered with the blood of the infected, inoculates the living against the infection.
effects: * Cures an ongoing zombie infection, and provides immunity to future infections when there's at least 5u of ambuzol plus
effectLine:
'''Medicine''':
* Cures an ongoing zombie infection, and provides immunity to future infections when there's at least 5u of ambuzol plus

name: pulped banana peel
desc: Pulped banana peels have some effectiveness against bleeding.
effectLine:
'''Medicine''':
* Reduces bleeding

name: saline
desc: A mixture of salt and water. Commonly used to treat dehydration or low fluid presence in blood.
effects: * Satiates thirst at 2x the average rate
effectLine:
'''Drink''':
* Satiates thirst at 2x the average rate
* Increases blood level

name: siderlac
desc: A powerful anti-caustic medicine derived from plants.
effectLine: '''Medicine''': * Heals 5 Caustic

name: stellibinin
desc: A natual anti-toxin with particular effectiveness against amatoxin.
effects: * Removes 3u of amatoxin from the solution when there's at least 1u of amatoxin
effectLine: '''Medicine''': * Heals 4 Poison * Removes 3u of amatoxin from the solution when there's at least 1u of amatoxin

name: synaptizine
desc: A toxic chemical that halves the duration of stuns and knockdowns.
effectLine: '''Poison''': * Deals 2 Poison * Removes 3s of stunning * Removes 3s of knockdown * Removes 15s of hallucinations

name: tranexamic acid
desc: A blood-clotting medicine used to prevent profuse bleeding. Causes heavier bleeding on overdose. Commonly found in small doses within emergency medipens.
effects: * Deals 3 Bloodloss when there's at least 15u of tranexamic acid
effectLine: '''Medicine''': * Reduces bleeding * Deals 3 Bloodloss when there's at least 15u of tranexamic acid

name: tricordrazine
desc: A wide-spectrum stimulant, originally derived from cordrazine. Treats minor damage of all basic health types as long as the user is not heavily wounded. Best used as an additive to other chemicals.
effects: * Heals 1 Brute, 0.5 Poison, 0.33 Heat, 0.33 Shock, and 0.33 Cold when it has at most 50 total damage
effectLine: '''Medicine''': * Heals 1 Brute, 0.5 Poison, 0.33 Heat, 0.33 Shock, and 0.33 Cold when it has at most 50 total damage

name: lipozine
desc: A chemical that accelerates metabolism, causing the user to hunger faster.
effects: * Satiates hunger at -0.333x the average rate
effectLine:
'''Medicine''':
* Satiates hunger at -0.333x the average rate

name: omnizine
desc: A soothing milky liquid with an iridescent gleam. A well known conspiracy theory says that its origins remain a mystery because revealing the secrets of its production would render most commercial pharmaceuticals obsolete.
effects: * Heals 2 Burn, 2 Toxin, 2 Airloss, and 2 Brute
effectLine: '''Medicine''': * Heals 2 Burn, 2 Toxin, 2 Airloss, and 2 Brute

name: ultravasculine
desc: A complicated anti-toxin solution that quickly flushes out toxin while causing minor stress on the body. Reacts with histamine, duplicating itself while flushing it out. Overdose causes extreme pain.
effects: * Modifies health by 3 Toxin and 0.5 Brute when there's at most 30u of ultravasculine
* Modifies health by 1 Toxin and 3 Brute when there's at least 30u of ultravasculine
* Removes 1u of histamine from the solution when there's at least 1u of histamine
* Adds 0.5u of ultravasculine to the solution when there's at least 1u of histamine
effectLine: '''Medicine''': * Modifies health by 3 Toxin and 0.5 Brute when there's at most 30u of ultravasculine * Modifies health by 1 Toxin and 3 Brute when there's at least 30u of ultravasculine * Removes 1u of histamine from the solution when there's at least 1u of histamine * Adds 0.5u of ultravasculine to the solution when there's at least 1u of histamine

name: oculine
desc: A simple saline compound used to treat the eyes via ingestion.
effectLine:
'''Medicine''':
* Heals eye damage

name: cognizine
desc: A mysterious chemical which is able to make any non-sentient creature sentient.
effects: * Makes the metabolizer sentient when there's at least 5u of cognizine
effectLine:
'''Medicine''':
* Makes the metabolizer sentient when there's at least 5u of cognizine

name: ethyloxyephedrine
desc: A mildly unstable medicine derived from desoxyephedrine, primarily used to combat narcolepsy.
effects: * Causes stuttering for at least 0.2s without accumulation
* Temporarily staves off narcolepsy when there's at least 10u of ethyloxyephedrine
effectLine:
'''Medicine''':
* Causes jittering
* Causes stuttering for at least 0.2s without accumulation
* Removes 10s of drowsiness
* Temporarily staves off narcolepsy when there's at least 10u of ethyloxyephedrine

name: diphenylmethylamine
desc: A more stable medicine than ethyloxyephedrine. Useful for keeping someone awake.
effects: * Temporarily staves off narcolepsy when there's at least 5u of diphenylmethylamine
effectLine:
'''Medicine''':
* Removes 10s of drowsiness
* Temporarily staves off narcolepsy when there's at least 5u of diphenylmethylamine

name: sigynate
desc: A thick pink syrup useful for neutralizing acids and soothing trauma caused by acids. Tastes sweet!
effects: * Deals 2 Heat when there's at least 16u of sigynate
* Causes jittering when there's at least 20u of sigynate
* Has a 2% chance to cause vomiting when there's at least 30u of sigynate
effectLine: '''Medicine''': * Heals 3 Caustic * Deals 2 Heat when there's at least 16u of sigynate * Causes jittering when there's at least 20u of sigynate * Has a 2% chance to cause vomiting when there's at least 30u of sigynate

name: lacerinol
desc: A fairly unreactive chemical that boosts collagen sythesis to incredible levels, healing slash trauma.
effects: * Deals 3 Cold when there's at least 12u of lacerinol
effectLine: '''Medicine''': * Heals 3 Slash * Deals 3 Cold when there's at least 12u of lacerinol

name: puncturase
desc: A fizzy chemical that helps rebuild trauma caused by piercing damage, leaving a slight amount of tissue damage behind.
effects: * Modifies health by 4 Piercing and 0.1 Blunt
* Deals 5 Blunt when there's at least 11u of puncturase
effectLine: '''Medicine''': * Modifies health by 4 Piercing and 0.1 Blunt * Deals 5 Blunt when there's at least 11u of puncturase

name: bruizine
desc: Originally developed as a cough medicine, it turns out this chemical is wildly effective at treating blunt force trauma.
effects: * Deals 4 Poison when there's at least 10.5u of bruizine
effectLine: '''Medicine''': * Heals 3.5 Blunt * Deals 4 Poison when there's at least 10.5u of bruizine

name: holy water
desc: The cleanest and purest of waters straight from the hands of god, is known to magically heal wounds.
effects: * Heals 0.2 Blunt, 0.2 Poison, 0.2 Heat, 0.2 Shock, and 0.2 Cold when it has at most 50 total damage
effectLine: '''Drink''': * Satiates thirst averagely '''Medicine''': * Heals 0.2 Blunt, 0.2 Poison, 0.2 Heat, 0.2 Shock, and 0.2 Cold when it has at most 50 total damage '''Plants''': * Adjusts water level by 1

name: pyrazine
desc: Efficiently heals burns from the hottest of fires. Causes massive internal bleeding when overdosed.
effects: * Deals 0.5 Slash and 0.5 Piercing when there's at least 20u of pyrazine
* Has a 10% chance to cause vomiting when there's at least 15u of pyrazine
effectLine: '''Medicine''': * Heals 1 Heat * Deals 0.5 Slash and 0.5 Piercing when there's at least 20u of pyrazine * Has a 10% chance to cause vomiting when there's at least 15u of pyrazine

name: insuzine
desc: Rapidly repairs dead tissue caused by electrocution, but cools you slightly. Completely freezes the patient when overdosed.
effects: * Removes 4u of licoxide from the solution
* Removes 4u of tazinide from the solution
* Removes 5kJ of heat from the body it's in
* Deals 2 Cold when there's at least 12u of insuzine
* Removes 30kJ of heat from the body it's in when there's at least 12u of insuzine
* Causes jittering when there's at least 12u of insuzine
effectLine: '''Medicine''': * Heals 4 Shock * Removes 4u of licoxide from the solution * Removes 4u of tazinide from the solution * Removes 5kJ of heat from the body it's in * Deals 2 Cold when there's at least 12u of insuzine * Removes 30kJ of heat from the body it's in when there's at least 12u of insuzine * Causes jittering when there's at least 12u of insuzine

name: opporozidone
desc: A difficult to synthesize cryogenic drug used to regenerate rotting tissue and brain matter.
effects: * Reduces 20s of rotting when the body's temperature is at most 150k and the mob is dead
effectLine:
'''Medicine''':
* Reduces 20s of rotting when the body's temperature is at most 150k and the mob is dead

name: necrosol
desc: A necrotic substance that seems to be able to heal frozen corpses. It can treat and rejuvenate plants when applied in small doses.
effects: * Heals 4 Brute, 5 Burn, and 2 Poison when the body's temperature is at most 213k
* Ages back the plant, depending on the plant's age and time to grow
effectLine: '''Medicine''': * Heals 4 Brute, 5 Burn, and 2 Poison when the body's temperature is at most 213k '''Plants''': * Adjusts toxins level by -5 * Adjusts health by 5 * Ages back the plant, depending on the plant's age and time to grow

name: aloxadone
desc: A cryogenics chemical. Used to treat severe third degree burns via regeneration of the burnt tissue. Works regardless of the patient being alive or dead.
effects: * Heals 3 Heat, 3 Shock, and 1 Caustic when the body's temperature is at most 213k
effectLine: '''Medicine''': * Heals 3 Heat, 3 Shock, and 1 Caustic when the body's temperature is at most 213k

name: mannitol
desc: Efficiently restores brain damage.
effectLine: '''Medicine''':

name: psicodine
desc: Suppresses anxiety and other various forms of mental distress. Overdose causes hallucinations and minor toxin damage.
effects: * Deals 2 Poison when there's at least 30u of psicodine
* Causes hallucinations for at least 0.8s with accumulation when there's at least 30u of psicodine
effectLine: '''Medicine''': * Deals 2 Poison when there's at least 30u of psicodine * Causes hallucinations for at least 0.8s with accumulation when there's at least 30u of psicodine * Removes 2s of jittering * Removes 6s of drunkness

name: potassium iodide
desc: Will reduce the damaging effects of radiation by 90%. Prophylactic use only.
effects: * Causes radiation protection for at least 0.2s with accumulation
* Deals 1 Poison when there's at least 20u of potassium iodide
effectLine: '''Medicine''': * Causes radiation protection for at least 0.2s with accumulation * Deals 1 Poison when there's at least 20u of potassium iodide

name: haloperidol
desc: Removes most stimulating and hallucinogenic drugs. Reduces druggy effects and jitteriness. Causes drowsiness.
effects: * Causes drowsiness for at least 0.4s with accumulation
* Removes 3u of desoxyephedrine from the solution
* Removes 3u of ephedrine from the solution
* Removes 3u of hyperzine from the solution
* Removes 3u of THC from the solution
* Removes 3u of space mirage from the solution
* Removes 3u of bananadine from the solution
* Removes 3u of space glue from the solution
* Removes 3u of mindbreaker toxin from the solution
effectLine:
'''Medicine''':
* Causes drowsiness for at least 0.4s with accumulation
* Removes 4s of jittering
* Removes 10s of hallucinations
* Removes 3u of desoxyephedrine from the solution
* Removes 3u of ephedrine from the solution
* Removes 3u of hyperzine from the solution
* Removes 3u of THC from the solution
* Removes 3u of space mirage from the solution
* Removes 3u of bananadine from the solution
* Removes 3u of space glue from the solution
* Removes 3u of mindbreaker toxin from the solution
